definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem

sentences.english: But there are also genetic grounds for the mongoose’s courage.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，貓鼬的勇氣，還有遺傳學的根據。

sentences.english: At Kamarpukur I have seen the mongoose living in its hole up in the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我在卡瑪普庫兒看過貓鼬住在隱蔽在牆上的洞穴裏。

sentences.english: The meerkat is in fact a mongoose.
sentences.chinese: 貓鼬實際上是獴科動物。

sentences.english: Meerkats are native to a desert region in southern Africa.
sentences.chinese: 海盜貓鼬源於南非的沙漠地區。

sentences.english: Reduced the effect of Elixir of Mongoose and Elixir of Major Agility.
sentences.chinese: 降低貓鼬藥劑與極效敏捷藥劑的效果。

sentences.english: Watchful meerkats scout for predators outside their burrow in the South African Kalahari.
sentences.chinese: 這種名爲海島貓鼬的動物生活在南非喀拉哈里沙漠。

sentences.english: How does the mongoose defeat the king cobra?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，這些貓鼬是如何擊敗眼鏡王蛇的呢？

sentences.english: At last the mongoose took on one of the world's most poisonous snakes.
sentences.chinese: 最終，貓鼬制服了世界上這隻最毒毒蛇之一的眼鏡蛇。
